messages.title: Every vote will count in important General Election
messages.content: Why Theresa May is right to call the General Election by Anna Soubry. The Prime Minister has not been afraid to tackle difficult issues and she is right to ensure Britain gets the best possible Brexit deal - by calling this election now.

messages.title: Supporting our great NHS
messages.content: Broxtowe residents Maureen Hunt works as a nurse in the NHS and is backing Anna Soubry and Theresa May. The NHS is one of our country’s most valuable institutions, we rely on our NHS and therefore the funding must be protected and sustained. Theresa will provide for our NHS and the funds needed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anna Soubry visited Jordan as a guest of Oxfam and saw how Britain is aiding Syria's refugees. She praises Britain's role and campaigns for further support.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Backing HS2 - representing everyone on the route
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anna Soubry supports HS2, which will benefit Broxtowe's economy and provide jobs. She addressed concerns to Parliament and achieved assurances, showing her effectiveness in representing all residents.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May is the only leader with the ability to get a good Brexit deal.
issues.health: The NHS is one of our country’s most valuable institutions, we rely on our NHS and therefore the funding must be protected and sustained.
issues.transport: Backing HS2 - representing everyone on the route
